text: Nina Aleksandrovna Andreyeva (, 12 October 1938 – 24 July 2020) was a Russian chemist, teacher, author, political activist, and social critic. She criticized General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev and his closest supporters for not being true communists.Quote: "...вопросы подняты серьезные и в таком ключе, который иначе как идейной платформой, манифестом антиперестроечных сил не назовешь. ""New Ferment On the Pariah Of Perestroika", NY Times Andreyeva died in St. Petersburg, Russia on 24 July 2020 at the age of 81. == Works == * * * == References == ==Other websites== *Full text of I Cannot Waive Principles (archived) as published in Sovetskaia Rossiia on March 13, 1988 *All-Union Communist Party Bolsheviks official site Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scientists from Saint Petersburg Category:Russian chemists Category:Russian communists Category:Critics
